ACB.ui.title: Archive Creature Brewer
ACB.ui.unsavedText: You have unsaved changes. Close anyway?
ACB.help.storageCompendiumOnly: Blueprints and exported creatures are stored only in compendium packs.
ACB.fields.name.label: Name
ACB.fields.name.help: Enter the creature name used for the blueprint and exports.
ACB.fields.img.label: Image
ACB.fields.img.help: Paste an image path or file picker URL for the creature portrait.
ACB.fields.size.label: Size
ACB.fields.size.help: Describe the creature size textually (e.g., Small, Huge).
ACB.fields.type.label: Type
ACB.fields.type.help: Describe the creature type or ancestry textually.
ACB.fields.tags.label: Tags
ACB.fields.tags.help: Comma-separated tags used to organize and filter the creature.
ACB.fields.publicDescription.label: Public Description
ACB.fields.publicDescription.help: Short narrative description visible to players.
ACB.fields.gmNotes.label: GM Notes
ACB.fields.gmNotes.help: Private notes only visible to the GM.
ACB.fields.challengeRating.label: Challenge Rating Text
ACB.fields.challengeRating.help: Text reference for CR or threat level (no math).
ACB.fields.levelText.label: Level Text
ACB.fields.levelText.help: Alternative level text for systems that use levels.
ACB.fields.acText.label: Armor Class Text
ACB.fields.acText.help: Plain text armor class or defense value.
ACB.fields.hpText.label: Hit Points Text
ACB.fields.hpText.help: Plain text HP or vitality notation.
ACB.fields.movementText.label: Movement
ACB.fields.movementText.help: Describe speed and movement modes in text.
ACB.fields.sensesText.label: Senses
ACB.fields.sensesText.help: Describe senses like darkvision or tremorsense.
ACB.fields.languagesText.label: Languages
ACB.fields.resistancesText.label: Resistances
ACB.fields.resistancesText.help: Text list of damage or effect resistances.
ACB.fields.immunitiesText.label: Immunities
ACB.fields.immunitiesText.help: Text list of damage or effect immunities.
ACB.fields.vulnerabilitiesText.label: Vulnerabilities
ACB.fields.vulnerabilitiesText.help: Text list of vulnerabilities or weaknesses.
ACB.fields.actions.help: Add traits, actions, reactions, and other blocks for the creature.
ACB.fields.actionBlock.label: Action Block
ACB.fields.actionName.label: Action Name
ACB.fields.actionType.label: Action Type
ACB.fields.actionType.help: Choose which section this action belongs to.
ACB.fields.actionText.label: Action Text
ACB.fields.actionText.help: Describe the action in plain text; inline rolls are optional.
ACB.fields.sourcePacks.label: Source Packs
ACB.fields.sourcePacks.help: Select compendium packs to search for library content.
ACB.fields.librarySearch.label: Library Search
ACB.fields.librarySearch.help: Search selected packs for features or items to import.
ACB.fields.attachments.label: Attachments
ACB.fields.attachments.help: Library entries attached to this blueprint.
ACB.validation.noActions: No actions or traits added yet.
ACB.validation.ratingWithoutDefense: Challenge rating text set without AC or HP text.
ACB.settings.sourcePacks.name: Library Source Packs
ACB.settings.sourcePacks.hint: Which packs should be searchable in the library.
ACB.settings.defaultBlueprintPack.name: Blueprint Pack
ACB.settings.defaultBlueprintPack.hint: Compendium pack used to store canonical blueprints.
ACB.settings.defaultCreaturePack.name: Creature Pack
ACB.settings.defaultCreaturePack.hint: Compendium pack used to store exported creature actors.
ACB.settings.showHelpText.name: Show Field Help
ACB.settings.showHelpText.hint: Display helper text under each field in the brewer UI.
ACB.errors.missingCompendiums: Required compendium packs are missing and must be created by a GM.
ACB.errors.gmOnly: Only GMs can save or export creatures.
